short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your productivity by reducing the effects of infinite scrolling and recommendation systems.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Increase your productivity by reducing distractions.
Browser extension to improve user's digital wellbeing. It focuses on reducing the effects of infinite scrolling, recommendation systems and home pages with multiple functions. The purpose of this application is to return the user to a greater awareness of his online actions, where instead the websites are intended to keep the user connected for as long as possible.

The user is free to choose which mechanism to activate via a control panel accessible directly from the browser. 
It is also possible to access your own usage statistics (time spent, scrolls and number of clicks) of supported websites.

GitHub link for help and suggestions: https://github.com/fabioS24/inControl
